TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DelimitedListTraceListener extends System.Diagnostics.TextWriterTraceListener

summary.span: 將追蹤或偵錯輸出導向文字寫入器，例如資料流寫入器，或導向資料流，例如檔案資料流。

span.span: Directs tracing or debugging output to a text writer, such as a stream writer, or to a stream, such as a file stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此追蹤輸出使用分隔的文字格式，該格式使用由 屬性指定的分隔符號。The trace output is in a delimited text format that uses the delimiter specified by the property. 分隔符號用來終止在某一行輸出中的每個欄位。The delimiter is used to terminate each field in a line of output. 例如，若要顯示在追蹤的輸出在 Microsoft Excel 試算表中，您可以指定逗號 （"，"） 做為分隔符號，並建立以逗號分隔值 (CSV) 檔案。For example, to display the trace output in a Microsoft Excel spreadsheet, you might specify a comma (",") as a delimiter and create a comma-separated value (CSV) file. > [!IMPORTANT] > 介面。 interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try`/ `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a`try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 您可以啟用或停用透過應用程式組態檔，然後使用已設定的應用程式中。You can enable or disable a through the application configuration file and then use the configured in your application. 或者，您可以建立程式碼中。Alternately, you can create a in your code. > [!NOTE] > 分隔，就會發出使用方法名稱開頭為文字的文字`Trace`，例如或。The delimits only text that is emitted by using the methods that have names starting with the word `Trace`, such as or . 追蹤資料的使用，就會發出和方法不以符號分隔。Trace data that is emitted by using the and methods is not delimited. 若要設定，編輯組態檔對應到您的應用程式的名稱。To configure a , edit the configuration file that corresponds to the name of your application. 在此檔案中，您可以加入接聽程式、 設定接聽程式的屬性或方法移除接聽程式。In this file, you can add a listener, set the properties for a listener, or remove a listener. 組態檔應該格式化，如下列範例所示：The configuration file should be formatted as shown in the following example: ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果您嘗試寫入正在使用中的檔案，或無法使用，檔案名稱自動加上為 GUID。If you try to write to a file that is in use or unavailable, the file name is automatically prefixed by a GUID. > [!NOTE] > 接聽程式要使用的方法來， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資訊。Listeners are intended to be used by methods of the , , and classes to write trace information. 接聽程式的方法，除了建構函式，不應該直接從應用程式程式碼呼叫。Listener methods, except for constructors, should not be called directly from application code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性設為值的`name`參數，或為空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。This constructor initializes the property to the value of the `name` parameter, or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 屬性可用來當做索引`Listeners`要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。The property can be used as an index into the `Listeners` collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下列程式碼設定屬性執行個體具有名稱"delimListener 」:For example, the following code sets the property for the instance of that has the name "delimListener": ``` ((DelimitedListTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["delimListener"]).Delimiter = ":" ```

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class that writes to the specified file and has the specified name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化的新執行個體類別上指定的路徑、 指定的檔案使用編碼方式。This constructor initializes a new instance of the class for the specified file on the specified path, using encoding. 如果檔案存在，就會附加至。If the file exists, it is appended to. 如果檔案不存在，則會建立新的檔案。If the file does not exist, a new file is created. > [!NOTE] > 若要減少發生例外狀況的機會，可能會讓輸出的任何字元會取代"？"字元。To reduce the chance of an exception, any character that might invalidate the output is replaced with a "?" character. 屬性設定的值為`name`參數，或為空字串 ("") 如果`name`參數是`null`。The property is set to the value of the `name` parameter, or to an empty string ("") if the `name` parameter is `null`. 屬性可用來當做索引`Listeners`要以程式設計方式變更接聽程式的屬性集合。The property can be used as an index into the `Listeners` collection to programmatically change the properties for the listener. 例如，下列程式碼設定屬性執行個體具有名稱"delimListener 」:For example, the following code sets the property for the instance of that has the name "delimListener": ``` ((DelimitedListTraceListener)Trace.Listeners["delimListener"]).Delimiter = ":" ```

summary.span: 取得或設定已分隔清單的分隔符。

span.span: Gets or sets the delimiter for the delimited list.
The delimiter for the delimited list.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的分隔符號是";"（分號）。The default delimiter is ";" (semicolon). 下列組態檔範例示範的設定屬性使用`delimiter`組態檔中的屬性：The following configuration file example shows the setting of the property using the `delimiter` attribute in a configuration file: ``` ```

is set to an empty string ("").

summary.span: 傳回由分隔的追蹤接聽程式支援的自訂組態檔屬性。

span.span: Returns the custom configuration file attribute supported by the delimited trace listener.

returns.span: 字串陣列，其中包含字串值 "delimiter"。

span.span: A string array that contains the single value "delimiter".

remarks.format: ## Remarks 自訂屬性會是不繼承自基底類別，可以用來設定類別之屬性的屬性。A custom attribute is an attribute that is not inherited from the base class that can be used to set a property for the class. 自訂屬性用來設定屬性。The custom attribute for is used to set the property. 下列組態檔範例將示範使用`delimiter`要設定屬性屬性：The following configuration file example shows the use of the `delimiter` attribute to set the property: ``` ```

summary.span: 將追蹤資料寫入輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace data to the output file or stream.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void TraceData (System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int id, object data);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance void TraceData(class System.Diagnostics.TraceEventCache eventCache, string source, valuetype System.Diagnostics.TraceEventType eventType, int32 id, object data) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub TraceData (eventCache As TraceEventCache, source As String, eventType As TraceEventType, id As Integer, data As Object)
public: override void TraceData(System::Diagnostics::TraceEventCache ^ eventCache, System::String ^ source, System::Diagnostics::TraceEventType eventType, int id, System::Object ^ data);

param.name: eventCache
param.span: 物件，包含目前處理程序識別碼、執行緒識別碼與堆疊追蹤資訊。

span.span: A object that contains the current process ID, thread ID, and stack trace information.

param.name: source
param.span: 用來識別輸出的名稱，通常是產生追蹤事件的應用程式名稱。

span.span: A name used to identify the output, typically the name of the application that generated the trace event.

param.name: eventType
param.span: 其中一個 值，可指定引發追蹤的事件類型。

span.span: One of the values specifying the type of event that has caused the trace.

param.name: id
param.span: 事件的數值識別項。

span.span: A numeric identifier for the event.

param.name: data
param.span: 將資料物件寫入輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: A data object to write to the output file or stream.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、資料物件，及事件資訊至輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a data object, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，和`id`參數寫入做為標頭。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. 資料物件會轉換成字串，使用`ToString`物件的方法。The data object is converted to a string using the `ToString` method of the object. `eventCache`資料會寫入做為其內容而定的值的頁尾屬性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 呼叫此方法的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，和`id`參數寫入做為標頭。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. 資料物件會轉換成字串時，使用`ToString`每個物件的方法。The data objects are converted to strings using the `ToString` method of each object. `eventCache`資料會寫入做為其內容而定的值的頁尾屬性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 呼叫此方法的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.

summary.span: 將事件追蹤資訊寫入輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes event trace information to an output file or stream.

summary.span: 寫入追蹤資訊、格式化的物件陣列，及事件資訊至輸出檔或資料流。

span.span: Writes trace information, a formatted array of objects, and event information to the output file or stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`source`， `eventType`，和`id`參數寫入做為標頭。The values of the `source`, `eventType`, and `id` parameters are written as a header. `args`物件陣列會轉換成字串，使用方法，傳遞`format`字串和`args`要追蹤的訊息部分的格式字串陣列。The `args` object array is converted to a string using the method, passing the `format` string and `args` array to format the string as the message portion of the trace. `eventCache`資料會寫入做為其內容而定的值的頁尾屬性。The `eventCache` data is written as a footer whose content depends on the value of the property. > [!IMPORTANT] > 方法不是由應用程式程式碼呼叫。The method is not intended to be called by application code. 呼叫此方法的方法， ，和類別來寫入追蹤資料。It is called by methods of the , , and classes to write trace data.
